meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin Arlow Sara Plant Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6275.

td.p: Erin Arlow, a stay-at-home mom from Portland, Oregon
Sara Plant, a travel specialist from Redondo Beach, California
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 5-day cash winnings total $127,000)

tr.td: ANIMAL TYPES
AN ABBREVIATED STORY
GERMAN CHANCELLORS SINCE WWII
SEE FOOD
NBA FINALS MVP
STOP THAT RACKET!
